licensing: Do not copy proprietary text; author original summaries.
privacy: Do not include secrets or personal data in capability declarations.
safety: Do not overwrite existing capability declarations.
Reject context and capability_id values containing path separators or dot-segments.

acceptance_criteria: Fails when the declaration already exists.
Logs a U.Work record when telemetry/log-work is available.

failure_modes: Missing required inputs (context, capability_id, title, work_scope, work_measures).
Invalid context or capability_id value (not a safe path segment).
Failed to write the capability declaration file.

inputs.description: Bounded context name used to locate runtime/contexts/<context> (must be a safe path segment).
inputs.name: context

inputs.description: Optional holder or system identifier for the capability.
inputs.name: holder

inputs.description: Optional notes for the capability declaration.
inputs.name: notes

inputs.description: Optional agent type declaring the capability.
inputs.name: agent_type

inputs.description: Optional RoleAssignment label used when logging U.Work (default: Strategist).
inputs.name: role_assignment

inputs.description: Optional semicolon-delimited list of related DRR ids or paths.
inputs.name: decisions

inputs.description: Optional ISO-8601 timestamp_start override (used for deterministic testing).
inputs.name: timestamp_start

intent.goal: Declare a capability statement for an agent or system within a bounded context.
non_goals: Does not assign roles or authorize actions.

name: Declare Agent Capability

outputs.description: Path to the generated capability declaration file.
outputs.name: capability_declaration_path

procedure.instruction: Validate required inputs (context, capability_id, title, work_scope, work_measures) and ensure safe path segments.
Create runtime/contexts/<context>/capabilities if missing and ensure the target file does not already exist.
Construct the capability declaration YAML with scope and measure lists.
If telemetry/log-work is available, log the capability declaration with agent metadata when provided.

summary: Declares an agent capability statement for a bounded context.
